channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bridging The Gap: Community Proximity And Environmental Education In Shark Conservation
item.description: Misconceptions, especially regarding species like sharks, hinder conservation efforts despite their crucial role in maintaining marine ecosystems.

item.title: The steep part of the mountain
item.description: The end of the trail is usually difficult, but without the long and winding approach, there isn’t much of a mountain. The greatest hits reel and the s...

item.title: The Foreign Pro-Trump Fake News Industry Has Pivoted To American Patriotism
item.description: It’s been more than eight years since content farms overseas started “American” fake news pages on Facebook. Their business, now fueled by AI, is stil...

item.title: “How can I help?”
item.description: If you have a series of tasks to do, it’s easier to ignore this question and simply get back to work. Doing the tasks is more efficient than coordinat...

item.title: The Dual Role Of AI In Fueling And Fighting Investment Scams
item.description: I believe understanding how criminals use AI is crucial. By anticipating their strategies, you can enhance your investigative tactics.

item.title: The sad compromise of “sponsored results”
item.description: Google made a fortune and honed sponsored search results into an art form. The theory is that people who want the traffic the most will pay for the cl...

item.title: Beyond MaaS: Embracing Multimodal Transit
item.description: Technology providers are in a unique position to raise awareness and advocate for greater acceptance and adoption of these systems.

item.title: The missing file
item.description: It contained some of my best writing. Cogent, clear and powerful. I found it. It wasn’t nearly as good as I remembered. In fact, it was hardly useful....

item.title: Improving Cyber Readiness In The Age Of AI And Quantum Computing
item.description: The recent proliferation of AI and improvements in quantum computing have exacerbated the risks of cyberattacks.

item.title: Knowing your customers
